Key Match Events: Tuesday's 118-97 loss to a Dallas Mavericks team that was without Luka Doncic and Kyrie Irving may have been the worst so far this season for the Los Angeles Lakers.
Austin Reaves shot just 5-of-14 from the field and had just one assist.
Reaves has now shot just 36.7% from the field in his last four games.
Post-Match Reflections: Austin Reaves didn't mince words about how poorly he played.
Reaves was in the middle of a stretch of games in which he turned in some of the best performances of his career so far.
